name: ENDLESS DUNGEON: DRAGON SAGA
description:
★★★New user will receive 30 Hero souls of Super Healer hero [Lea] &
1,325 cubics including 300 free cubics and 1,025 cubics
to celebrate 50,000 users playing! Users can buy [Buyx11] Treasure Chest
for 3 times with 1,325 cubics.★★★


+ Enjoy endless full 3D idle RPG
+ Gather more gold throughout the quest and challenge higher stage
with various 70 heroes
+ You can strengthen your heroes throughout the collection of "Time Stone" by unlimited Time Loop
+ Challenge to the 3,000 stages to defeat the red dragon!

Game features
- Idle game type clicker RPG with the humorous game story
- Easy and simple control and Time Loop system!
- Various 70 differentiative heroes
- Each character's fun gag show!
- Just click, and collect gold for the level up!
- Support 15+ languages

Event and Annoucement
Official Community : https://story.funple.com/us/en/endlessdungeon

Precautions
- If you change your device or delete a game without Google account synchronized connection, all game data will be reset.
- There are in-app purchases and advertisement functions.
- This app requires the Internet connection.

Q&A and Customer Support
If you still have a problem, Please contact help.game@funple.com (Support Time : MON~FRI 9:00~ 18:00) with below information
Sorry for your inconvenience.

■ Required information
1. Nickname/Google account:
2. Time of the problem happens:

4. Request matter:

※ The reply can be delayed based on the circumstances.
